CMPT 355 — Individual Project
 

Package cmpt355.project.ast.node

AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) node classes for the Java compiler. The key classes are
  • AstNode — abstract base class of all AST nodes; provides utility methods for finding ancestor nodes and walking the tree
  • Statement — base class for statement-like nodes
  • Expression — base class for expression-like nodes
There are some AST nodes not defined in this package, the most important of which are the DataType family of classes in the cmpt355.project.language package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AstNode
    Abstract base class for abstract syntax tree nodes.
    ClassDefinition
    An AST node representing the definition of a class (or an interface).
    ClassDefinition.Builder
    A helper class (following the builder pattern) for creating a ClassDefinition.
    DataTypeNode
    AST node type for a data type.
    Expression
    Abstract base class for expression-like AST nodes.
    FieldDeclaration
    Class representing the declaration of a field (instance variable or static/class variable) in a ClassDefinition.
    FieldDeclaration.Builder  
    Import
    AST node representing an import, e.g.
    JavaFile
    AST node representing a source (.java) file.
    MethodDefinition
    AST node representing the definition of a method in a class/interface.
    MethodDefinition.Builder  
    Statement
    Abstract base class for a statement-like AST node.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ClassDefinition.Type
    An enum describing the type (class or interface definition)
